CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper September 22, 1945, pg. 23, reads: "Visitors Feted - James and William Christian of Birmingham and Charleston, N. C., are having a good time at the party given in their honor by uncles, James and William Lucas, of South Thirtieth Street, North Side. Left to right: James Craft, William Christian, Jean Craft, James Christian, Delores Wilson, Mattie Holloway and Corian Dugger. William and James Lucas are standing. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: James Craft, William Christian, Jean Craft, James Christian, Delores Wilson, Mattie Holloway, and Corian Dugger seated around table with William Lucas and James Lucas standing, in Lucas home on South Thirtieth Street, Northside
